options.label: EVM API
options.name: evmAPI
options.description: API for interacting/fetching standard onchain data using Moralis API key.

options.label: NFT API
options.name: nftAPI
options.description: API for interacting/fetching NFT data using Moralis API key.

options.label: DeFi API
options.name: defiAPI
options.description: API for interacting/fetching DeFi data using Moralis API key.

options.label: Upload to IPFS
options.name: uploadFolder
options.description: Upload multiple files in a folder to IPFS and place them in a folder directory.

actions.label: Folder
actions.name: folderContent
actions.description: The path to a folder to be uploaded.

inputParameters.label: Order
inputParameters.name: order
inputParameters.description: The field(s) to order on and if it should be ordered in ascending or descending order. Specified by: fieldName1.order,fieldName2.order. Example 1: "block_number", "block_number.ASC", "block_number.DESC", Example 2: "block_number and contract_type", "block_number.ASC,contract_type.DESC"
